sentences.sContent: You are also invited to join us on our prayer days (this year, June 6 to June 14 inclusive).
sentences.sCn: 你也受邀加入我们的祷告日（今年从6月6日（含）至6月14日（含））。

phrases.pCn: 无所不包的；包括一切的；总括

words.tran: 包括（include的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: After stating the first and last item in a set of things, you can add inclusive to make it clear that the items stated are included in the set
